kesako.watcher.runnable

Class ListSourceProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • kesako.watcher.runnable.IntervalDBWork
      • kesako.watcher.runnable.ListSourceProcess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ListSourceProcess
extends IntervalDBWork
    Monitor the list of sources and create a watcher by source to survey the content of the source and update the index.
    The class implements the Log4J logging system.
    Author:
    Frederic SACHOT

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

    • Constructor Detail

      • ListSourceProcess

        public ListSourceProcess(int listIntervalSeconds,
                 int fileIntervalSeconds)
        Process that monitors the list of sources.
        Parameters:
        listIntervalSeconds - Number of seconds between two check of the list of sources.
        fileIntervalSeconds - Number of seconds between two check of the content of a source.

    • Method Detail

      • createSourceWatcher

        private void createSourceWatcher(int idSource,
                       java.lang.String sourcePath)
        Check if the source has already a watcher or create one if not.
        The name of the source watcher is: Th_SW< idSource >
        Parameters:
        idSource - id of the source
        sourcePath - path of the source

      • deleteSourceWatcher

        private void deleteSourceWatcher(java.sql.Connection cn,
                       int idSource)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Delete the source's watcher of the source idSource.
        The name of the source watcher is: Th_SW< idSource > Before suppressing the watcher, the method stop it and then delete it. Then all file of the source are marked to be suppressed.
        Parameters:
        idSource - id of the source for which the watcher will be suppressed
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • doWork

        protected void doWork()
        Check the list of sources. If the source is marked to be suppressed, the source's Watcher is suppressed, else the source's watcher is created.
        Specified by:
        doWork in class IntervalDBWork
